products.name: Precision Locknuts
products.design: High-precision locking nuts featuring machined internal threads and sturdy faces for strong metal-to-metal locking, available in axial, flank, radial, and clasp locking configurations for secure component mounting.
products.applications: Securing bearings, gears, and other power transmission components on shafts and spindles.
products.features: Axial, Flank, Radial, and Clasp locking types for high rigidity and precision adjustment. Machined internal threads and sturdy faces for strong metal-to-metal locking with high axial rigidity and runout accuracy (typically 0.005 mm or better).
products.differentiator: Provides reliable, high-force clamping without damaging shaft threads, with high axial rigidity and runout accuracy.

specifications.materials: Stainless steel, hardened alloy steel, heat-treated alloy steel (often with black oxide finish)
specifications.locking_methods: Resilient ring, peripheral setscrews, face setscrews, clamping screws, shoes lock, axial locking by segments, radial locking pegs

products.name: Ball Transfer Units
products.design: Omnidirectional load-bearing units featuring spherical balls in precision housings for smooth, low-friction movement in any direction, available in pressed metal, heavy-duty machined, spring-loaded, and plastic series with various mounting options.
products.applications: Multi-directional movement of heavy loads in conveying systems, workbenches, and assembly lines.
products.features: Pressed metal, heavy-duty machined, spring-loaded, plastic series. Flange, bolt, press-fit mounts. Some units include seals to prevent dirt ingress or drain holes for self-cleaning. Load capacity from 3kg to 6500kg with various housing and ball material options for different environments.
products.differentiator: Omnidirectional load-bearing spheres for smooth, precise, and low-friction movement of loads in any direction.

specifications.housing_materials: Hardened steel, pressed metal sheet, plastic (POM), stainless steel (for corrosive environments)
specifications.ball_materials: Chrome steel, stainless steel, carbon steel, nylon, POM, PUR, glass (for non-magnetic)
specifications.temperature_range: Standard: up to 100°C; Special: up to 200°C
